channel.title: KramaticX RsPs[Looking for players]
channel.description:
Webclient : http://www.rswebclients.com/play/KramaticX Client download : http://www.mediafire.com/?k164g64de1y8848 Vote - http://www.top100arena.com/in.asp?id=78646
100% Update Time Guaranteed 100% No Lag Constant Updates Active support Friendly Staff Members Automatic Vote/Donation System Fully working highscores to compete on ! The latest RSPS features Most unique RSPS Daily updates!
SERVER -
All new RS Items New models/HD Fast loading client Webclient Daily updates Perfect pking Fast and smooth switches HD with resizeable 10x hits No lagg 100s of bosses Dungeoneering with over 8 floors and rewards Summoning with working familiars and scrolls Active pking Duel arena with staking and no dupes All dupes fixed No bugs Several quests to complete Loads of benefits for donators Donate for items or donator status! Great and active staff Dicing New minigames/customised Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic Loads of shops with everything you need Slayer with points and rewards Custom quest tab Clanchat working Custom interfaces Castlewars 100% Barrows with fair rewards, just like RS Elites, fight to get their armour Corporeal Beast, drops spirit shields Unique point systems Why carry on reading when you can experience it ! come play now at [url=http://kramatic.forumotion.com/]KramaticX website[/url]
[size=18]Server[/size] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y6vmmXCiNXs&feature=plcp[/youtube] [size=18]Awesome Players![/size] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QD5dGXsdOr8&feature=channel&list=UL[/youtube] [size=18]Duel[/size] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X6at9xN1o80&feature=plcp[/youtube]
